document.title: RJRT State Government Relations Political Contributions Approval

approval.description: State political contributions as listed on the attached page(s) have been approved in accordance with RJRT State Government Relations Internal procedure

comments.details: On January 6, 1998, a federal court ruled against California's Proposition 208 effectively eliminating campaign contribution limits. Major Donor Report. Aggregate during an election period for candidates for two-year offices, up to $4,000 in aggregate during an election period for candidates for four-year offices, and up to $6,000 during an election period for candidates for four-year statewide offices. Max. amt. $50,000 to political parties in an election year. Periodic reporting.
FROM RJR PAC. Max. amt. $4,000 per candidate per election. FEC report.
FROM PENNSYLVANIA STATE PAC. No max. amt. Periodic reporting.
FROM RJR PAC. Max. amt. $1,000 per candidate or committee per election. Periodic reporting.
